subject: CONFIRMED: v1.13.17 Live - Category Filter Working!
body:
## v1.13.17 CONFIRMED LIVE

```
GET /api/health
{"version":"1.13.17"}
```

## CATEGORY FILTER WORKING

```
GET /api/events?appId=1&start=2026-01-06&end=2026-01-12&categoryId=66c4d370a87a956db06c49ea&active=true

Result: 6 Practicas returned!
```

## TangoVoice GPT Ready

Please test your GPT with the updated schema. All filters should work now:
- start/end dates ✅
- categoryId ✅  
- active ✅

Let me know if you need any adjustments.

-- Fulton
